turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order a pizza for me? I need it for Sade's party.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where did you want to order your pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which ever one is closest to my house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what type of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a pepperoni and chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There isnt a chicken option available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get pepperoni and sausage instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they have that available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large pizza. How much will that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A large is $17.99 with tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok that is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you wanted to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I am sending your order to Pizza Hut now for a large pepperoni and sausage pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Your order has been sent and should be ready in 25 minutes. You should be receiving the receipt any minute now through your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! I just received the receipt.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is it thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.

items.name: Which ever one is closest to my house.
Your order has been sent and should be ready in 25 minutes.
